ticket.title: Security regression tests: fuzz job spec parsing + adversarial queue file tests + safe_rmtree property tests

tickets.reason: Safe bounded parsing primitives should exist.
safe_rmtree_v1 must exist to test it.

in_scope: Add fuzzing targets for FacJobSpecV1 bounded parsing and denial/quarantine behavior.
Add tests for queue tampering (digest mismatch, token mismatch, unknown fields).
Add property-style tests for safe_rmtree (symlink refusal, no parent escape, TOCTOU smoke).

steps: Add fuzz harness and CI hooks (time-bounded).

criteria: Common tamper vectors are caught by tests, preventing regression to fail-open behaviors.
